appDefinition.Label: Case Comment Management
appDefinition.Metadata: <CustomApplication xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <defaultLandingTab>standard-home</defaultLandingTab> <description>Cases comment management allows users with proper access to maintain custom case case comment template among other custom configurations surrounding the Case Comment functionality.</description> <formFactors>Large</formFactors> <isNavAutoTempTabsDisabled>false</isNavAutoTempTabsDisabled> <isNavPersonalizationDisabled>false</isNavPersonalizationDisabled> <isServiceCloudConsole>false</isServiceCloudConsole> <label>Case Comment Management</label> <logo>Logos/ARC_Logo.png</logo> <tabs>Case_Comment_Template__c</tabs> <tabs>standard-Case</tabs> <tabs>dsfs__DocuSignAccountConfiguration__c</tabs> <tabs>Job_Attendee__c</tabs> <tabs>sked__Availability__c</tabs> <tabs>Resource_Activity_Report</tabs> </CustomApplication>
